entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as clearing her throat loudly.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as giving a dazzling smile and hugging Ginny, then ushering the Delacours into the house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being thrown by Ginny.

entities.name: monsieur delacour
entities.description: Monsieur Delacour is described as pronouncing everything from the seating plan to the bridesmaids' shows 'Charmant!'

entities.name: madame delacour
entities.description: Madame Delacour is described as being most accomplished at household spells and having the oven properly cleaned in a trice.

entities.name: gabrielle
entities.description: Gabrielle is described as following her elder sister around, trying to assist in any way she could and jabbering away in rapid French.

relationships.description: Ginny hugged Mrs. Weasley, as described in the text: 'she gave Mrs. Weasley a dazzling smile and hugged her'.
Ginny threw Harry, as mentioned in the text: 'then threw Harry 108 The Ghoul in Pajamas'.
Mrs. Weasley ushered the Delacours into the house, as described in the text: 'she ush-ered the Delacours into the house'.
Monsieur Delacour pronounced everything from the seating plan to the bridesmaids' shows 'Charmant!', as described in the text.
Madame Delacour cleaned the oven properly, as described in the text: 'had the oven properly cleaned in a trice'.
Gabrielle followed her elder sister, Madame Delacour, around, as described in the text: 'Gabrielle followed her elder sister around'.
